1.pregunta:
¿Qué debes hacer en esta situación? 
 Saque de banda
1.respA:
Pass the ball to
any teammate
1.respB:
Pass the ball to
the goalkeeper

2.pregunta:
¿Qué debes hacer en esta situación? 
 Recibir la pelota después del saque inicial
2.respD: Tirar el balón a la banda

3.pregunta:
¿Qué debes hacer en esta situación? 
 Tiro libre con una barrera
3.respA: Pasar el balón a un compañero
3.respC: Disparar por encima de la barrera

4.pregunta:
What you should do in this situation? 
 1v1 against the goalie
4.respA:
Shoot to the far 
 post of the goalkeeper

5.pregunta:
What you should do in this situation? 
 PK

6.pregunta:
What you should do in this situation? 
 Booked

7.pregunta:
What you should do in this situation? 
 Build up play after pressing to the goalie
7.respA: Pass with the left or right defenders
7.respC: Kick the ball far from the area
7.respD: Kick the ball out of the field

8.pregunta:
What you should do in this situation? 
 1v1 Defending
8.respA: Hold the player and then steal the ball

9.pregunta:
What you should do in this situation? 
 Receiving a cross in the air without opposition
9.respA: Header with power to the goal
9.respC: Control and play against the goalkeeper

10.pregunta:
What you should do in this situation? 
 Being sub
10.respA: Come out and cheer for the teammate who is coming in
10.respC: Don’t pay attention to the substitution

11.pregunta:
What you should do in this situation? 
 Recibir el balón iniciando el partido
11.respD:
Throw the ball 
 to the sideline

12.pregunta:
What you should do in this situation? 
 Saque de banda
12.respA: Pass the ball to any teammate
12.respB: Pass the ball to the goalkeeper
12.respD: Pass the ball to the free teammate

13.respA: Pass the ball to your teammate
13.respB: Shoot on the goalkeeper second post

14.pregunta: Mano a mano con el portero
14.respA: Shoot on the goalkeeper far post

16.respD: Try to take the second warning

17.respD: Throw the ball out of the field

18.pregunta: Defendiendo en un mano a mano
18.respA: Hold the striker and steal the ball

19.pregunta:
Recibir centro por arriba 
  y sin marca dentro del área
19.respB: Put down the ball and shoot on goal
19.respC: Receive the ball and go on a 1 vs GK

20.respA: Leave the field and cheer my teammate
